questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Wizard Myrtle at the fountain near the entrance to the Wizards' Tower. (Fairy ring DIS) (Chat 2•✓•1)
Go to the Edgeville ruins just south of the bank and speak to Vannaka. (Chat 1•4•1)
Return to the Wizards' Tower, and talk to Wizard Myrtle. (Chat 2•1)
Make your way to Mudskipper Point. The fastest route is via fairy ring AIQ. Alternatively, you can run south from the Port Sarim lodestone.
additionalStepInformation: The fastest route is via fairy ring AIQ.
Alternatively, you can run south from the Port Sarim lodestone.

questSteps.stepDescription: Unequip your weapons and dismiss followers and then talk to Wizard Myrtle. (Chat 1•2•1)
additionalStepInformation: If you have completed the Freeing Pirate Pete Recipe for Disaster subquest, or have built any kind of diving suit in the Aquarium. (Chat 1•1•2•1)

questSteps.stepDescription: If you have completed the Freeing Pirate Pete Recipe for Disaster subquest, or have built any kind of diving suit in the Aquarium. (Chat 1•1•2•1)
additionalStepInformation: East of the room, read the message in the bottle for the key and open the door.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Brynna, the survival expert. (directly to the south)
Gather the seaweed nearby and cut the dead tree.
Catch Two Raw Shrimp.
Interact with the boulder.
Cook both shrimp on the steam vent (two squares west of the boulder) to receive two boiled shrimps.
additionalStepInformation: Boil 1 shrimp again to burn it. (Keep one boiled shrimp)

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Brynna twice.
Continue through the west gate.
Go to the building to the west and talk to Lev, the master chef.
Go to the large jellyfish south-east of the chef's house and play the music box. (Chat 2•3•1)
Gather tasty seaweed.
additionalStepInformation: First Solution Answer: Sweet, Sour, Spicy -> 1 up, 2 up, 3 up
Second Solution Answer: Mellow, Sour, Bitter -> 2 down, 2 up, 3 down
Third Solution Answer: Spicy, Salty, Bitter -> 3 up, 1 down, 3 down

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the master chef again.
Prepare the large table 3 times by matching the 3 tastes with 3 ingredients. (large table is in the same house)
Recipe Number And Recipe Solution
First: Sweet, Sour, Spicy -> 1 up, 2 up, 3 up
additionalStepInformation: Right click and close the doors.

questSteps.stepDescription: Second: Mellow, Sour, Bitter -> 2 down, 2 up, 3 down
additionalStepInformation: Retrieve the bronzish bar from the furnace.

questSteps.stepDescription: Third: Spicy, Salty, Bitter -> 3 up, 1 down, 3 down
Continue through the west door to the small house in the north.
Climb down the ladder.
Talk to Dezzick, the mining instructor. (Chat 1•3)
Mine soggy copper ore and soggy tin ore.
additionalStepInformation: Click on the rats and other elements bouncing on the screen once it begins.

questSteps.stepDescription: Add the ores to furnace
Right click and close the doors.
Operate the pump and light the furnace.
Retrieve the bronzish bar from the furnace.
additionalStepInformation: Leave through the 2 doors to the east
Head south to the church through double doors

questSteps.stepDescription: Smith a bronze dagger.
Talk to the mining instructor again.
additionalStepInformation: One of the five fish will tell you where the book is. Search for it.

questSteps.stepDescription: Continue through the east gate.
Talk to Vannaka, the combat instructor. (Chat 1•2)
Open the gate and click on the sword in the middle of the room to begin combat training.
Click on the rats and other elements bouncing on the screen.
Exit the cage and climb the ladder to the north-east.
Fishy business
Talk to the financial advisor. (Chat 1)
Enter the vault (the code is 139).
Talk to the financial advisor.
Leave through the 2 doors to the east
Head south to the church through double doors
Talk to Brother Brace.
Read the friend list
There will be 2 fish just east of the bank and 3 fish back through the 2 doors leading through the bank
One of the five fish will tell you where the book is. Search for it.
Give the book to Brother Brace.
Go through the south door to the south-east building and talk to Wizard Terrova. (Chat 1•1)
Attack a chicken.
Talk to the wizard.
Commotion in the ocean
Pick any option during the cutscene.
Channel the spell while repelling Crassians.
Finish Hector Vivian.
Talk to Wizard Myrtle. (Chat 1)
Quest complete!
